EmailTemplate.description: Sent to Field Sales participants about receiving a Coaching
EmailTemplate.name: 11. Manager Coaching Effectiveness Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Tell Us About Your Manager Coaching Experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Manager Coaching Effectiveness
Manager Coaching Program is an important part of achieving success throughout your Onboarding Journey and to help you become fully ramped as soon as possible.
In order to continue to improve the program and enhance the Learning Journey for all our sales professionals, we are asking you to answer a brief survey based on your experience.
Select https://wex.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_26a5yuAz5E1WVzn to take the survey. Please complete this by next Friday.
Email Sales Training with any questions.
Thank You, WEX Global Sales Training
